College_Name: Seamedu School of Pro-Expressionism, Gurgaon, Haryana
College_Summary: Seamedu School of Pro-Expressionism is a prestigious Private institute in Gurgaon and was founded in 2008 to produce outstanding and globally relevant professionals for the Media, Management, and Technology industry. The college is affiliated with The Northcap University of Gurgaon and has received an ‘A’ grade from NAAC. Seamedu offers a wide range of Undergraduate, Postgraduate, Diploma, and Certificate programs across disciplines such as Science, Arts, Journalism, Film Making, Game Development, Computer Applications, Business Administration etc. Master Classes on Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality are also conducted, wherein students are taught how to build simple applications for mobile devices.

RMS Business School is a Gurgaon-based college that came into existence in 2007 under the aegis of Rao Neki Ram Memorial Colleges. It offers MBA and PG Diploma programs across disciplines such as Human Resource Management, Financial Management, Supply Chain Management, Marketing Management, Healthcare and Hospitality Management, Aviation Management, etc. The college is approved by AICTE, Ministry of HRD - Government of India, affiliated to Gurugram University and accredited by the NBA, NAAC with an A++ grade, and American professional and accreditation organization Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business, also known as AACSB. Admission to RMS courses is granted to aspiring students based on their merit and overall academic records in the previous year’s qualifying exam, and scores of entrance tests such as CAT/ MAT/ XAT/ CMAT/ GMAT/ ATMA. Group discussions and personal interviews are also conducted by the Admission Committee to shortlist applicants.
